entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
